conversations.content:
I will be arriving in Paris on Sunday. Can you please provide me the the name of a restaurant which serves French cuisine that open on Sunday? Recommend me the restaurant with the best rating.
Tell me the restaurant name, rating, address, and the operating hours.

<function_thought>
To fulfill the user's request effectively, I will start by getting all the restaurants in Paris. After that, I'll identify which ones serve French cuisine and check their opening hours on Sunday. Finally, I will retrieve ratings and addresses for the ones that qualify, particularly focusing on the one with the best rating. This is the first step in the initialized function trajectory.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
It appears that there were no results returned from the query to get all restaurants in Paris. To ensure I complete the user's request, I will execute a different query to gather the list of restaurants. This will allow me to proceed to identify those that offer French cuisine.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>
